section.title: Another basic task

note.title: ***Design Note***
note.para: The procedures described in this section are "Basic" in that they do not implement an underlying Java feature or concept such as Managed Beans or Persistence etc. They require no (or very little) technical explanation other than a description of how to perform the procedures in JBoss Tools.

section.para: JSF Tools provides the facility to .... This provides the user with ....
